original_text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out, and having found him he said, “Do you believe in the Son of Man?”
korean_text: 예수께서 그들이 그 사람을 쫓아냈다 하는 말을 들으셨더니 그를 만나사 이르시되 네가 인자를 믿느냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그들이 그를 쫓아냈다는 것을 들으셨다.

sentences.original_text: and having found him he said
“Do you believe in the Son of Man?”
